subject: Re: Dear Trusted one
body:
Dear Charles

Thank you so much for your message and willingness to assist in this
project. Absolutely, it is important to indicate the kind and nature of
charity work I desire, which mainly is to promote the gospel of our Lord
Jesus. Establishing churches and promoting the work of God.

Also helping the orphans and widows. Mainly donating to orphanage homes and
helping victims of war and natural disasters affected people globally.

This is the kind of charity work that pleases my heart. I will feel
fulfilled to see this kind of charity implemented in good faith.

So this is my brief explanation, and now I would like you to forward your
details for the process to commence and once again do have a lovely day and
remain blessed.

Sincerely,

Your sister,

Mrs. Mary Russell.

subject: Dear Trusted one
body:
Dear Trusted one
 
I believe my email will be coming to you as a surprise since we have not met before and you would also think how I know you. I found your profile from the guestbook resumes directories and I decided to contact you.
I am Mrs. Mary Russell , a native of London, an aging widow of 78 years old, i am suffering from a long time cancer illness and i have some funds which i inherited from my late husband the sum of Ten Million Four Hundred Thousand Great British Pounds also needed a very honest and God fearing person that will use this fund for charity purposes sincerely because of my present health condition and through this unconditionally task and since my days to live are numbered i will like to be remembered also immortalize when I am gone.
Kindly get back to me immediately if you have made up your mind with the details below to enable me to prepare a letter of Authorization in your name so that the Foreign Bank Account where my fund was deposited will proceed for the release of my last wish to you .
(1) Your full names: ===
(2) Personal or official contact address: ====
(3) Home or Office phone#:==Cell phone#:===Fax#:===
(4) Your Age: ===
(5) Sex: ===
(6) Marital status: ===
(7) Occupation:===
Yours Faithfully,
Mrs. Mary Russell
Reply to my following E-mail:
mrsmaryrussell8732@gmail.com

subject: Re: Dear Trusted one
body:
Dear Mrs. Mary Russell,

I am truly touched by your email and I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's indeed a noble cause that you wish to use your funds for charity purposes. 

However, I would like to know more about the charities or causes you are passionate about? Are there any specific areas or sectors where you want this fund to be utilized?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Dear Trusted one
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Russell,

Thank you for your heartfelt message. It's wonderful to hear about your passion for charity work, especially in areas such as promoting the gospel of our Lord Jesus, helping orphans and widows, and aiding victims of war and natural disasters. These are indeed noble causes.

I'm curious to know more about how you got involved in this line of work? Also, could you share some stories or experiences that have been particularly impactful for you?

As for my details, I would prefer to understand more about the process before sharing any personal information. Could you please explain what the next steps are?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Dear Trusted one

subject: Re: Dear Trusted one
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Russell,

Thank you for your heartfelt message. It's truly inspiring to hear about your dedication to promoting the gospel of our Lord Jesus and helping those in need, especially orphans, widows, and victims of war and natural disasters.

I'm curious to know more about how you got involved in this noble cause. Could you share some of your experiences? Also, I'd love to understand better how I can contribute to these efforts without sharing my personal details due to privacy concerns.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert
